languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, каждый лишний миг, потраченный на разговоры с этим еретиком, мог бы быть мигом, который мы бы потратили на его устранение и предание этого места очистительному огню. Так может, начнем?"
"Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, каждый лишний миг, потраченный на разговоры с этим еретиком, мог бы быть мигом, который мы бы потратили на его устранение и предание этого места очистительному огню. Так может, начнем?"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent on destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"
"Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent on destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"
"Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"
"Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"
"Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"

languages.text: “行商浪人，你与这个异端分子说话的每分钟都是在浪费时间。我们本可以用这些时间消灭他，让净化的烈焰烧尽这里的一切。你不觉得我们是时候动手了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，你与这个异端分子说话的每分钟都是在浪费时间。我们本可以用这些时间消灭他，让净化的烈焰烧尽这里的一切。你不觉得我们是时候动手了吗？”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、この異端者との対話に費やす時間は、彼を破滅させ、この場所に浄化の炎を放つ時間ともなり得るのです。そろそろ始めてはどうですか？」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、この異端者との対話に費やす時間は、彼を破滅させ、この場所に浄化の炎を放つ時間ともなり得るのだ。そろそろ始めてはどうか？」
「自由開拓者よ、この異端者との対話に費やす時間は、彼を破滅させ、この場所に浄化の炎を放つ時間ともなり得るのです。そろそろ始めてはどうですか？」

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, jede Sekunde Gespräch mit diesem Ketzer wäre besser genutzt, wenn wir ihn vernichten und diesen Ort den reinigenden Flammen übergeben würden. Sollten wir nicht endlich damit anfangen?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, jede Sekunde Gespräch mit diesem Ketzer wäre besser genutzt, wenn wir ihn vernichten und diesen Ort den reinigenden Flammen übergeben würden. Sollten wir nicht endlich damit anfangen?"

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, chaque seconde passée à discuter avec cet hérétique pourrait plutôt être consacrée à son exécution et à la purification de cet endroit par les flammes. Ne ferions-nous pas mieux de nous mettre au travail ? »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"

traits.locale_text: « {Mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, chaque seconde passée à discuter avec cet hérétique pourrait plutôt être consacrée à son exécution et à la purification de cet endroit par les flammes. Ne ferions-nous pas mieux de nous mettre au travail ? »

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, cada momento que pasamos hablando con este hereje podría ser un momento que dedicamos a destruirlo y a purificar este lugar con fuego. ¿No deberíamos empezar?».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, cada momento que pasamos hablando con este hereje podría ser un momento que dedicamos a destruirlo y a purificar este lugar con fuego. ¿No deberíamos empezar?».

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, zamanımızı bu kâfirle konuşmak yerine onu öldürmeye ve burayı arıtıcı alevlere boğmaya harcayabiliriz. Başlasak mı artık?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, every moment spent on talking to this heretic could be a moment spent destroying him and committing this place to purifying flames. Isn't it time we got started?"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, zamanımızı bu kâfirle konuşmak yerine onu öldürmeye ve burayı arıtıcı alevlere boğmaya harcayabiliriz. Başlasak mı artık?"
